title: Quick and easy Thai style coleslaw
ingredients: ['1/2 head white cabbage, shredded', '1/2 head red cabbage, shredded', '2 carrots, grated', '4 tablespoons lime juice', '4 tablespoons rice wine vinegar', '1 tablespoon fish sauce', '2 tablespoons sesame oil', '2 tablespoons honey', '50g (2 oz) chopped peanuts', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
